masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We have FOUR Santas in the mall right now. Three are our scheduled performers, but one claims to be the REAL Santa and is offering kids 'authentic North Pole experiences.' Parents are confused. Kids are crying. One Santa challenged another to a 'ho-ho-ho-off.' Help?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
